Description:
<0>GetMaxDistance - retrieves the maximum distance.
<1>HRESULT IDirectSound3DBuffer::GetMaxDistance(
<3/><1>D3DVALUE* <2>MaxDistance
<1>);
<2>MaxDistance - address of a variable that receives the maximum distance, in meters by default. D3DVALUE is defined as float.

<0>SetMaxDistance - sets the maximum distance.
<1>HRESULT IDirectSound3DBuffer::SetMaxDistance(
<3/><1>D3DVALUE <2>MaxDistance,
<3/><1>DWORD Apply
<1>);
<2>MaxDistance - new value of maximum distance between source and listener. The default value is <2> DS3D _ DEFAULTMAXDISTANCE , equivalent to one unit of distance (one meter).
Name: Maximum distance
